Class Celestial

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • GameObject
        • Celestial
  • public class Celestial
extends GameObject
    The Celestial class stores the properties of the main planet (Earth), including the scale factor between the raw value (in astronomical units) and the game Earth-Asteroid distance.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    John Seong
